                                  java.lang.Integer clientID)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException,

        Creates Minimum spanning Tree as Graph, according to Kruscal Algorithm
        Specified by:
        minimumSpanningTree in interface IRemoteService
        Parameters:
        graph - graph to calculate spanning tree
        clientID - the client ID who called the service.
        Returns:
        minimum spanning tree as a graph. *
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        javax.naming.NoPermissionException - if client has not enough credit.
